bioAsHtml: Josh Long is the Spring Developer Advocate on the Spring team at Pivotal. He is a Java Champion, a JavaOne rockstar, a blogger, and spends entirely too much time on Twitter. Josh is the lead-author on 5 books on Spring (including a new book from O'Reilly tentatively titled "Building Microservices with Spring Boot") and a new video training series - Building Microservices with Spring Boot Livelessons - from Addison-Wesley on using Spring and Cloud Foundry to build cloud-native applications.
bio: Josh Long is the [Spring Developer Advocate](http://spring.io/team/jlong) on the Spring team at Pivotal. He is a Java Champion, a JavaOne rockstar, a [blogger](http://spring.io/team/jlong), and spends entirely [too much time on Twitter](http://twitter.com/starbuxman). Josh is the lead-author on 5 books on Spring (including a new book from O'Reilly tentatively titled "Building Microservices with Spring Boot") and a [new video training series - _Building Microservices with Spring Boot Livelessons_ - from Addison-Wesley](http://www.informit.com/store/building-microservices-with-spring-boot-livelessons-9780134192451) on using Spring and Cloud Foundry to build cloud-native applications.
